SELECT GONGGU_NO AS gongguNo, PRODUCT_NO AS productNo, MEMBER_NO AS memberNo, (SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER_TBL M WHERE M.MEMBER_NO=G.MEMBER_NO) AS memberId, (SELECT MEMBER_PATH FROM MEMBER_TBL M WHERE M.MEMBER_NO=G.MEMBER_NO) AS memberPath, (SELECT GONGGU_NUMBER FROM PRODUCT_TBL P WHERE P.PRODUCT_NO = G.PRODUCT_NO) AS totalCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DETAIL_GONGGU_TBL D LEFT JOIN GONGGU_PAY_TBL GP ON (GP.DETAIL_GONGGU_NO = D.DETAIL_GONGGU_NO) WHERE D.GONGGU_NO=G.GONGGU_NO AND GONGGU_PAY_STATUS=1) AS joinCount
FROM GONGGU_TBL G WHERE PRODUCT_NO=#{_parameter}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DETAIL_GONGGU_TBL A INNER JOIN GONGGU_PAY_TBL B ON A.DETAIL_GONGGU_NO = B.DETAIL_GONGGU_NO WHERE B.GONGGU_PAY_STATUS = '1' AND A.GONGGU_NO = #{gongguNo}
SELECT DETAIL_GONGGU_NO AS detailGongguNo, GONGGU_NO AS gongguNo, MEMBER_NO AS memberNo FROM DETAIL_GONGGU_TBL WHERE GONGGU_NO = #{gNo}
SELECT SUM(COUNT_NUMBER) AS countNumber FROM DETAIL_GONGGU_TBL
